description: Bursting with flavour, this hoisin and garlic chicken stir-fry recipe is ready in just 15 minutes. Perfect for a speedy family midweek dinner.
name: 15 Minute Hoisin & Garlic Chicken StirFry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 450 g microwave long grain white rice
400 g Cook traditional vegetables stir fry mix
90 g Five Tastes Chinese hoisin & garlic stir fry shots

recipeInstructions.text: Add stirfry shots and 2 tbs water, then stir-fry for 1 minute or until chicken is cooked through. Divide rice and stir-fry among bowls, then serve.
